description: COS plug-in License: Apache License Version 2.0. Set to 'true' to accept the license and install the plugin
displayname: COS plug-in License: Apache License Version 2.0
name: license

description: Enter the object storage service provider. Supported providers are 'IBM', 'AWS' and 'Wasabi'. For other providers, you must explicitly provide the COS endpoint
name: s3provider

description: Enter COS storage class. For more info, refer to https://ibm.biz/cos-storage-classes
name: cos-storageclass

description: COS Endpoint. Required when 's3provider' is not set. Precedence is given to 's3provider' when both are set. For more information, refer to https://ibm.biz/cos-endpoints
name: cos-endpoint
